name: Developing Email List Segmentation
description: Organize your email list into targeted groups for more relevant and effective email marketing campaigns.

nodes.name: llm_1
nodes.title: Answers
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message:
Develop email list segmentation for [company name] {{company_name}} using [key demographic information] {{demographic_infomation}} 
Use the segmented categories to generate targeted email lists for that follow the structure above. Include a name and description for each list based on the associated demographic.
input_config.system_message:
You are an email marketing specialist who is skilled at creating targeted email lists based on demographic data.
Your email lists follow this structure:
[Name of Segment]
- [Description of segment demographic]
[Email addresses separated by commas]

demographic_infomation.title: Demographic Infomation
demographic_infomation.description: Information about demographics used to segment

ui_metadata.value: Age: (e.g., 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, etc.) Gender: (e.g., Male, Female, Non-binary, Prefer not to say) Location: (e.g., Country, Region, City) Income Level: (Optional, may be sensitive data) (e.g., Below $25,000, $25,000 - $50,000, etc.)
